com.communote.server.api.core.application

Interface ApplicationInformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManifestApplicationInformationProvider

    public interface ApplicationInformation
    Holds information, like the version, of the running application.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationRealPath

        String getApplicationRealPath()
        Returns:
        path to the directory where the application got extracted to. The path is terminated by a path separator.

      • getBuildNumberWithType

        String getBuildNumberWithType()
        Returns:
        the build number including a suffix which marks he build as standalone (ST) or multi-tenant saas build (OS).

      • getBuildTimestamp

        long getBuildTimestamp()
        Returns:
        Timestamp of the build time of the current version.

      • getBuildNumber

        String getBuildNumber()
        Returns:
        the build number (e.g. 1.0.1.2222) - included the revision

      • getBuildTime

        String getBuildTime()
        Returns:
        the time of the build as string in the format yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss or an emty string if the build time is not available

      • getProjectVersion

        String getProjectVersion()
        Returns:
        the project version without a SNAPSHOT suffix

      • getRevision

        String getRevision()
        Returns:
        the revision or the GIT hash of the commit the build is based on

      • isStandalone

        boolean isStandalone()
        Returns:
        true if this is the standalone version of Communote.
